response.summary:
Mechatronics Engineer from National Universtiy of Colombia experienced in the development of web applications in different languages such as python, java, Nodejs and PHP; additionaly experienced in management of databases SQL and No SQL; with excellent use of cloud services such as azure and aws.
Highly enthusiastic for unit test development and integration for
continuous improvement of delivered products, with knowledge of
continuous integration and continuous deployment.
With studies in automation, control and mechanical design. I have
acquired great capacity for group management and teamwork, becoming competent, dedicated, hard-working person with a high
level of responsability, leadership and decision-making skills.
response.skills: JavaScript, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microcontrollers, Robot Operating System (ROS), Ubuntu, Matlab, Python (Programming Language), Autodesk Inventor, English, German, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, LaTeX, Business Intelligence (BI), Agile Project Management, Lean Software Development, Java, Linux, React.js

profile_positions.description: Development of graduate web of National University, developed in NodeJs and React, it was deployed with microservices of aws such as lambda, SNS, Batch and S3, with management of data in postgreSQL
